item.title: Dynamite
item.description: You are setting fires in my name. You invite a moth into the flames. There’s a steep price to pay, But I know that I’ll stay. Your kind of sorcery is dangerous to me — It’s gonna blow us skyscraper high. Your sensuality is stirring something deep, Unless it’s all a trick of the night. My heart is made of dynamite, dynamite! Dynamite, dynamite! Dynamite, dynamite! I should tell myself until I learn.
